search.description: Search by name, number, or types

searchByName.heading: Search by name
searchByName.description: You can search for a Pokémon by name. If you only remember part of the Pokémon's name, It can still probably find it for you. It can't deal with typos right now though.

searchByNumber.heading: Search by number
searchByNumber.description: Search by national dex number. If you want Bulbsaur, just type 1, not #001.

searchByType.heading: Search by type
searchByType.description: Here are a few examples of how to seach by type.

type.description: Search for Pokémon that have a fire as either of their types in any form (e.g. Charmander, Charizard, Rotom).

doubleType.description: Search for Pokémon that are either water/flying (e.g. Gyarados) or flying/water (e.g. Cramorant).

singleType.description: Search for Pokémon that are only grass type, no 2nd type (e.g. Tangela, Chikorita).

contact.heading: Contact Me
contact.intro: Hi, I'm <homepage>Brian</homepage> (they/them), and I made Pokémon Type Calculator (pkmn.help).
contact.email: Please email your thoughts and thank-yous to <email>pkmn@wavebeem.com</email>.

language.label: Language
language.helpText: Language support is incomplete. Only Pokémon names are translated.

theme.label: Theme
theme.help: “System default” will change automatically depending on your operating system settings.

typeCount.label: Number of types
typeCount.help: Pokémon can briefly have three types at once if hit with Forests's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. The third type field is hidden by default since it is rarely used.

serviceWorker.description: This button can help fix issues in the app.

privacy.heading: Privacy
privacy.description: I will never runs ads or steal your personal data. I use <plausible>Plausible Analytics</plausible>, which is self-funded, independent, hosted in the EU, and doesn' store any cookies on your computer.

givingBack.heading: Giving Back
givingBack.description: I have spent countless hours improving this site. If you appreciate what I've made, please consider donating to charities that support BIPOC and transgender rights.

legalInfo.heading: Legal Info
legalInfo.pokemon: Pokémon © 2002–{year} Pokémon. © 1995–{year} Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc. ™, ® and Pokémon character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
legalInfo.dontSueMe: No copyright or trademark infringement is intended in using Pokémon content on this page.
